revised_title: Anatomy, Histology, and Physiology of the Intra-ocular Muscles of Mammals
tldr: This study investigates the anatomy, histology, and physiology of the intra-ocular muscles in mammals, focusing on the iris and ciliary muscle. The research includes experiments on rabbits, dogs, and cats, as well as human eyes, and discusses the action of drugs such as cocaine, atropine, and eserine on these muscles.
